dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset that exhibits both global and context-specific bigram distributions, allowing the study of how transformers learn to balance these types of knowledge during training.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset (Bigram Language Model)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing the complete works of William Shakespeare, often used for language modeling and text generation tasks.
dcterms:title: Tiny Shakespeare Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing video clips of various human actions, annotated with keypoints for action recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Dar
M. Geva
A. Gupta
J. Berant
dcterms:description: A dataset used for analyzing the behavior of transformers in embedding space, particularly for action recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Sub-JHMDB Dataset
